Entity

Class Room

    • Entity.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the entity for rooms

    2018-04-01

    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(RoomType type,
            java.lang.String roomNumber,
            java.lang.String bedType,
            boolean wifiEnabled,
            java.lang.String facing,
            java.lang.String smoke,
            java.lang.String status)
        Constructor of Room() Create a new room with the given room type, room number, bed type, WiFi option, area that the room is facing, smoking option, and room status
        Parameters:
        type - The type of this room
        roomNumber - The number of this room
        bedType - The bed type of this room. Room can have single, double, or master bed size
        wifiEnabled - The WiFi option of this room. true means there is WiFi in this room. false means there is no WiFi in this room
        facing - The view of the place the room is facing. Room can be facing the sea, an open area, or the city
        smoke - The smoking rule of this room Room can either allow smoking or don't allow smoking
        status - The status of this room Room can be vacant, occupied, reserved, or under maintenance

      • Room

        public Room()
        Constructor of Room() Create a new empty room
